item.description:
Hey Folks,

Last week's Live Karaoke event was a smashing success. We had about 18 people from our group and "Fun with Alcohol!". It turns out we have some talented folks in the groups. Matt truly rocked the place on the harmonica. The live band twist on Karaoke is really great - it's so much more fun singing on stage with a band backing you (and helping when you screw up!). The free appetizers were great too!

For those who couldn't make it last week here's the deal:

The Lansdowne Pub has a fun new twist on Karaoke - a live backing band! No more crappy sound system and cheezy fake music behind you. Get up on stage and belt with the band. The backing band is the "Jukebox Heroes". They have a song list of ~150 songs - something for everyone! I will be posting their song list so look for it under the "Files" menu.

We''l start at 9:00PM so we have have time for a few drinks before the Karaoke starts. Nobody should attempt karaoke without having a few drinks first :-) We've reserved a table for 20+ people near the stage and The Lansdowne is providing free appetizers for the first hour!

Come on out and channel your inner rock star!

I hope to see you there!

Your Friendly organizer,

Patrick

This is a joint meetup with Fun with Alcohol, so we're gonna have a big, fun group - again!
item.how_to_find_us: We will be at the "L" shaped table to the left of the stage. I'm the guy with the ponytail who looks suspiciously like my picture :-)
item.name: Live Band Karaoke at The Lansdowne Pub!
